name: Radius Intelligence
tagline: Selling to Small Businesses Made Easy.
description:
Radius provides data and tools to help companies reach small businesses
By collecting and organizing local data from across the web, Radius is making it easy for companies to reach over 20 million small businesses. Radius collects and matches disparate web data to individual businesses, helping companies identify businesses that are new, growing, and receptive to new partners.

Small businesses account for a staggering 99.7% of all employers in the U.S. For the past decade, they've created 65% of all new jobs and have employed over half of all private sector workers. With an excess of unorganized local data on the web, finding the right small businesses can be overwhelming. Radius helps by analyzing and organizing the web's data around 20 million small businesses in the United States.
Great data is just the start. Radius makes opportunities actionable with advanced lead generation tools and SaaS CRM integrations that provide accurate data on any SMB. Radius works seamlessly inside Salesforce and Microsoft Dynamics.
